overview: It‘s the story of a magical place that becomes the protagonist and inspirer of listening, perceptions and moods.  “Suggestions and Other Silences” is a short film about women and men who open their feelings and their souls to the point of becoming an intimate part of a place inhabited by stories and events made of dreams and fantastic desires.  It is as if those places, which amaze for their magnificence and splendour, celebrated the contemplation of suggestions and silences.
title: Suggestions and Other Silences
